data.note: The Ministry of Finance guarantees all financial obligations of EETC under the PPA for projects over 20MW. The offtaker does not have a history of non-payment. In the longer term, there is a question mark over what happens when EETC is no longer a subsidiary of the Egyptian Electricity Holding Co. and therefore may not be covered by the sovereign guarantee.
data.name: Power offtake risk for independent generators
